trans-unit.source: Describes a change in the scrolling state and contains the required arguments for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged"></xref> event.
Gets the updated height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent height.
Gets a value that indicates the change in height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in extent height.
Gets the updated width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent width.
Gets a value that indicates the change in width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in extent width.
Gets a value that indicates the change in horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Gets the updated horizontal offset value for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated value of the horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Performs proper type casting before invoking the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate
If you provide either the `genericHandler` or `genericTarget` as a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), exceptions are raised.
The event handler to invoke, in this case the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate.
The target upon which the `genericHandler` is invoked.
Gets a value that indicates the change in vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Gets the updated value of the vertical offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Gets the updated value of the viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated viewport height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates the change in value of the viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in vertical viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Gets the updated value of the viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated value of the viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates the change in viewport width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
